caller_intent: Robin Nelson wants to update her auto insurance policy by removing two vehicles (a 2002 Chevrolet Silverado and a 2007 Honda Odyssey) and adding a new 2007 Cadillac, effective Saturday, with liability-only coverage.
resolution_steps: Verified Robin's mailing address (280 Bethesda Drive, Lexington, KY 40505).
Confirmed the vehicles being removed (Chevrolet truck and Honda Odyssey) and the new vehicle (2007 Cadillac).
Guided Robin to locate the VIN on the new vehicle's windshield or driver-side door.
Obtained the VIN number (1G6DM57T570148631) and confirmed the vehicle is not financed.
Clarified coverage type (liability-only) for the new vehicle.
Notified Robin the update will take 24 hours and she will receive an email confirmation.
Suggested using an existing policy ID card for proof of insurance until the update is complete.
summary: Robin Nelson contacted Alliance Insurance Services to update her auto insurance policy by removing two vehicles and adding a new one. The agent verified details, guided her to locate the VIN, and explained the 24-hour processing timeline. The call concluded with confirmation that an email notification would be sent upon completion.
